SELECT nt.no , nt.title , ui.name , nt.`date` FROM tb_notice nt INNER JOIN tb_userinfo ui ON nt.loginID = ui.loginID WHERE nt.delete_yn IS NULL
and nt.title like CONCAT('%', #{title}, '%')
and nt.contents like CONCAT('%', #{contents}, '%')
and nt.`date` >= STR_TO_DATE(#{from_date}, '%Y-%m-%d')
and nt.`date` <= STR_TO_DATE(#{to_date}, '%Y-%m-%d')
and ui.name like CONCAT('%', #{userID}, '%')
ORDER BY nt.no DESC LIMIT #{pageIndex}, #{pageSize}
